thread.title: Re: BAHAHA! The Onion trolls Hollywood elite at the Oscars, breaks the Internet
thread.title_full: Re: BAHAHA! The Onion trolls Hollywood elite at the Oscars, breaks the Internet

author: AverageJoe1987
title: Re: BAHAHA! The Onion trolls Hollywood elite at the Oscars, breaks the Internet
text:
BAHAHA! The Onion trolls Hollywood elite at the Oscars, breaks the Internet Posted at 11:31 am on February 27, 2017 by Sam J. 
Even before Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway pulled a Steve Harvey with the Best Picture Oscar, social media was well on its way to ‘trolling’ the Oscars in an epic fashion. 
Like this glimmer of brilliance from The Onion : Large Mirror Brought Out Onto Oscars Stage Gets Resounding 6-Minute Standing Ovation https://t.co/UsEWkl681s pic.twitter.com/6TlvukzILm 
— The Onion (@TheOnion) February 27, 2017 
Nothing illustrates the massive egos of Hollywood like a giant mirror; add to that the joke of them giving themselves a six-minute standing ovation and it’s INTERNET magic. 
Or at least it’s pretty damn funny. Best piece about the oscars @TheOnion @wokieleaks1 
— hopeless wanderer (@thewargarurumon) February 27, 2017 Trending
